turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello. Yeah, I would like to order a pizza from the pizzeria Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you today?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what did you want from bella luna.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Do they have a Chicago-style pizza?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: they sure do.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Fantastic. I'll take one medium, thin crust, Chicago-style pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I'll also take a medium margherita style pizza on thin crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it. You want 1 medium thin crust chicago style pizza and 1 medium margarita style pizza on thin crust.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that's right. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is that right?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: awesome, the total is $34.55.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What is the most popular pizza at Bella Luna?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: the most popular is the meat lovers.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. All right, thank you so much for your help.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to pick those up. Yes, for pickup, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want me to place the order now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, i've placed the order for pick up. It'll be ready in 35 mins.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that'd be all. Thank you so much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you need anything else?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: awesome, take care.
